Name: Coptic textile
Description: A fragment of coarse linen cloth with an embroidered design. The motif is a bird in the colours of orange, indigo, red, yellow and green.Technique: plain weave ground, tapestry, built up shapes, slits and curved weft.Ends per inch (warp threads): 24.Picks per inch (weft threads): 20 over ground, 112 over tapestry.
